title: The Creature
body: Ok, I'm just writing stuff to make sure I have enough text to test my CSS stuff. Yes I could just paste a lipsum but I just feel like typing my stream of thoughts into this JSON file. It's honestly quite interesting how easy it is to just put thoughts into writing without thinking. Clearly I am thinking but it doesn't feel like it. In fact, I don't think I even know what I typed like 3 sentences ago. Anyway, I hope you enjoyed this filler text.
